name: hanging by a thread (JojoGamesDev)
description:
the two climbers must get to their tent, but they are joined together by a limited length of rope, so they must take care not to get too far apart.

CONTROLS green climber: WASD purple climber: Arrow Keys

Steer the two different climbers towards the grips to climb upwards, but don't let the rope get too long, otherwise it will snap! You can either play this on your own, controlling both climbers, or share the keyboard with a friend.
